name: The Legend Of Zelda - Press Enter
name_original: The Legend Of Zelda - Press Enter
description:
IMPORTANT  PLEASE READ

To download this game, the rar file first has to be unzipped which will give you the executable file, if you are using windows the game can be launched straight away, if you are using linux you will have to run the executable file through wine.

You are Link, the hero of Hyrule.

Inspired with a mix of The Ocarina Of Time and The Minish Cap.

Use the arrow keys to move.

Press Z to use your sword.

Press X to use your shield.

Press Spacebar for your action button.

Press A, S & D to use your items.

Press Enter to enter the pause menu and equip your items by pressing the item buttons. (A, S & D)

Have fun exploring using your Sword and Shield and many other items including, Bombs, Bow, Boomerang, Hookshot, Fire Ice and Light arrows and the Lens Of Truth.

Press F1 at any time to read game information.

Features include a dynamic Titlescreen, H.U.D, Heart engine, Magic engine, Pause menu, Music and Sound effects, Mini map and more.

If you don't want the H.U.D to be displayed you can press V at any time to switch pro mode on or off.

You can also turn the mini map on or off by pressing M.

Talk to Navi by pressing N and control using the mouse.

You can press the F button to warp to the Test Room.

The L button will warp you to the Temple Of Time.

In the test room you have access to 3 doors, the left room will take you to the world of Ocarina Of Time, the middle door will take you to the world of the Minish Cap.

ESC - Save, Quit Game & Load Game.{

Press Esc to have the option to save your game, if you select yes the game will be saved and will continue, if you select no you will be asked if you want to continue playing, if you select no the game will end, if you select yes you will then be asked if you want to load a game but will only work if you have previously saved the game.(Will not work on the Titlescreen.)}

This is an update of a game i made years ago on the GameMaker Sandbox community which was originally intended to be Ocarina Of Time 2D which you can download by clicking the link below.

https://www.yygarchive.org/game/81028

This game is still in development so some places are not available yet and not everything is where it will be in the future, you start with all your items except the Sword, Shield and Bomb bag which can be picked up in the house.

To support this project if you come across any issues in regards to gameplay please notify me so i can fix it, but please check the devlog Bug Report first where i will post known issues and get them fixed before i update the game.

Thank you and i hope you enjoy playing.
